attributes.action: Provide a reasonable pay rise for all NHS workers
attributes.additional_details:
There is an increasing concern that without a reasonable increase that people, especially nurses, will continue to leave this sector thereby reducing the ability to provide a quality caring service.
People have clapped and painted rainbows in support of the NHS. Now is the time to back up that support with a reward for the commitment and dedication which has held this nation together over the last year.
attributes.background: Increasing the tax rate by 1p in the pound would generate an additional £5.5bn which on its own would allow an increase of 9.8% for NHS workers. However a proposal of a 5% increase for all NHS staff from this funding would cost £2.8bn leaving £2.7bn to be used for other public sector workers

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
